name: Dark Wish
detailed_description:
Dark Wish is an indie 2.5D hyper turn-based role-playing game set in a dystopian wasteland. You play as 'Hero', a wanderer lost in the desert finding a way back to Megacity. Explore 'The Dust', a strange and unusual place filled with dangerous animals, bandits, and zany wanderers who pass on by. A playful and unique story unfolds as you work towards your goal. But, you make it across the wilderness before you lose all sanity?

Key Features

  • World-exploration with story elements: Follow your main quest to escape the desert, but stop to meet unique and weird friends on the way.
  • Hyper turn based combat system: Battles that capture the complexity of turn based tactics as well as blending time between turns.
  • Comprehensive character building and inventory system: There are many character builds to try out, perks to choose from, and hundreds of items to find and use.
  • Unique Sound Track: Over two-and-a-half hours of original composed and produced 'synthtronica' music created just for Dark Wish.
  • In-game camera snapper, log-book and over-world markers: the player is encouraged to find their own way.
  • Extensive list of options and configuration specifics available via the in-game menu. The game UI is rebuilt and scaled to the screen size.

Advanced features (for engine-heads, modders, and geeks alike)

  • Maximum modification: The entire game engine is designed and built for user configuration, tweaking, and mods. Workshop integration coming soon.
  • Core game files can be over-ridden: also it is easy to add new creatures, scenery objects, equipment and items, towns, and quests.
  • Map scenery editor.
  • Drag and drop music compatibility: place or remove music in the music folders to mix in what you want.
  • Built in console, with a range of cheats, debug, and developer commands.

short_description: Dark Wish is an indie 2.5D hyper turn-based role-playing game set in a dystopian wasteland. Explore 'The Dust', a strange and unusual place filled with dangerous animals, bandits, and zany wanderers who pass on by. A dark but playful and unique story unfolds as you work towards your escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 support (circa 2010) with 1 GB VRAM (GeForce GTX 460, Radeon R7 240, Intel HD Graphics 4000)
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
